mapper.insert:
select customer_customer_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into customer values (#{customerNo},#{customerId},#{customerPassword},#{customerName},#{customerDob},#{customerAddress}, #{customerGender},#{customerPhone},#{customerEmail},#{customerNickname},#{customerJoindate})
mapper.select:
SELECT c.customer_no, c.customer_id, c.customer_password, c.customer_name, c.customer_dob, c.customer_address, c.customer_gender, c.customer_phone, c.customer_email, c.customer_nickname, c.customer_joindate,
-- Review details r.review_no, r.review_title, r.review_content, r.review_image, r.review_rating, r.product_no,
-- Orders details o.orders_no, o.orders_date, o.orders_arrivaldate, o.orders_totprice, o.orders_finalprice, o.orders_totqty, o.orders_address, o.orders_status, o.customer_coupons_no as order_custom_coupon_no,
-- Order Items details oi.orders_items_no, oi.orders_items_price, oi.orders_items_finalprice, oi.orders_items_qty, oi.orders_items_options, oi.product_no,
-- Product details p.product_no, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_category, p.product_detailpage, p.product_desc, p.product_status,
-- Customer Coupons details cc.customer_coupons_no , cc.customer_coupons_enddate, cc.customer_coupons_status, cc.coupon_no ,
-- Coupon details cp.coupon_no , cp.coupon_name, cp.coupon_id, cp.coupon_discount, cp.coupon_desc
FROM customer c LEFT JOIN review r ON c.customer_no = r.customer_no LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_no = o.customer_no LEFT JOIN orders_items oi ON o.orders_no = oi.orders_no LEFT JOIN product p ON oi.product_no = p.product_no LEFT JOIN customer_coupons cc ON c.customer_no = cc.customer_no LEFT JOIN coupon cp ON cc.coupon_no = cp.coupon_no WHERE c.customer_no = #{c.customer_no}
mapper.update: update customer set customer_password = #{customerPassword}, customer_address = #{customerAddress} , customer_gender = #{customerGender}, customer_phone = #{customerPhone} , customer_email = #{customerEmail}, customer_nickname = #{customerNickname} where customer_no = #{customerNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from customer where customer_id = #{customer_id}
